message.body: Cute!!!
Is that for Melissa's ######?
Oh no.. manager's son turning 5
Oo. Haven't heard from her is about 7 months. She called me at ccp after he had her locked up.
They still together? Anyone even talk to her anymore?
I heard about that stuff.. Lydia told me afterwards. She is about the only one I still keep in touch with
Erein from time to time
They were in January when he got he locked up. Then I heard she went back. No one at work claims to still talk to her since the whole Adam situation
Yea I figured
I have her old extension so I get random calls from people for her
I think she claims to have lost her phone or adonis took it so she claims to not have anyones numbers anymore so she hasnt talked to me since I left ccp
I saw ettore recently... we had a coffee meet up about 2 months ago and last month I made a cake for her daughter

She called me crying saying she is sorry for not being in touch and stuff. Then Erein called her when Nia gram died or something and a man answered saying this isn't her phone anymore. Apparently Freddie paid for her engagement ring
It's so weird. I don't feel bad for her. She goes back to him.
I saw her in October walking down cottman ave holding hands with him. Neither of their kids there
She had an apartment up there somewhere
I told her job lol
Took*
Makes senses as to why I haven't seen her around here yet then... I was wondering that... i moved from the apt. Got a house now. I moved like 4 blocks away from where she was living
Lol.. I knew you were back at ccp I didn't know which position... I know laura and mia left
Apparently nia is at her moms. She would take the bus alone from the northeast to south Philly. So I guess her mom said she can stay there.
Idk.. its a messed up situation

When I came back I did Aetna. Then Laura couldn't handle it so they have it back to me. Then she quit or got fired no one knows. (I don't care either) now I am Medicare and commercial (Lisa m did). She is the Aetna girl now.
Damn lol yea idk either. I think she said quit but anyone could just say that.
